PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-18552007-12-03,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of CANDICE J. MOLNAR of Regina, Saskatchewan, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years; designate CANDICE J. MOLNAR for the Manitoba/Saskatchewan region, as established under subsection 10(1.1) of that Act; and determine that CANDICE J. MOLNAR shall reside within 100 kilometres of the Manitoba/Saskatchewan regional office, effective January 7, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
